top_comments.comment: And now we how deeply Jungkook means when he says that he will either live with passion or he won't live !

comments_since_last_sample.body: Please do more reactions to his  solo songs Jungkook like  Still With You .. or  decalcomania ...He is really a great singer and superstar. I hope he will have more chances to be recognized worldwide and to show his solo talent.
what type of kitten do you have ?
